title: Sir You Are Being Hunted (Latest With 1.1 Patch) (GOG)
description:
Hey guys, here the latest version of "sir, you are being hunted" This torrent includes an updated installer and the new 1.1 patch. For users, who donloaded my previous torrent of this game. Uninstall that version of the game. The 1.1 patch won't work with that installer. You have to install the new installer that included in this torrent. Hope you guys enjoy and please help seed.


------------------------


(1.1 Patch Notes)


Changes 

- NEW: Custom Biome (activated in Game Options.) 

- NEW: Global robot spawn manager. 

- NEW: Added graphics option to disable God Rays. 

- NEW: Colour picker for robot visors (Colour blindness support). 

- Robot step height tweaked. 

- Fences no longer appear over seriously sloped terrain. 

Fixes 

- Audio-based distraction of robots now more reliable. 

- Robots can no longer spawn inside pylons. 

- Shots Fired stat now accurate. 

- Starting gear item count now matches menu list.


----------------------------
